2021.title: Started working at Center for Computational and Data Sciences
2021.description: I have started 💼 working at CCDS as a Research Assistant. I am currently working on a project called 'Radio Galaxy Classification' with AKMM Rahman and KMB Asad.

2021.title: Graduation
2021.description: Got my degree 🎓 from the Independent University, Bangladesh. I was a Computer Science and Engineering student.

2020.title: Started working at Independent University, Bangladesh
2020.description: I have started working at IUB as a 👨‍🏫 Teaching Assistant. My main responsibility is to teach the students of Numerical Methods course.

2017.title: Got admitted to 🏛️ Independent University, Bangladesh
2017.description: I got admitted to IUB as a 💻 Computer Science and Engineering student in spring 2017.
